channel.title: RetributionPK [614] [Spawn]
channel.description:
Webclient - http://retributionpk.org/play/ Forums - http://retributionpk.org/f/ Downloadable Client - Download from the site
RetributionPK is a brand new server with a lot to deliver. We strive to bring you the best pking and hybridding anywhere. With flawless switches and 100% up time with no lag, You can be sure this is the place for you.
Features:
Flawless Hybridding Flawless Switching 100% Up time Original Fatality Source Dicing Clans Active Pking Community Auto donation system Auto Vote System All special attacks work how they should Pking teleports like easts, wests and gdz Productive staff team that knows what pkers want Not an abundance of staff Active Forums Unique donator shop and vote shop Only getting bigger
:.:.:.:.:.:.:.:.:.
Our staff team is composed of two main developers and, one moderator at this time. This
